title: Mother Tongue - author responds to her mother

content.question: During the talk described in paragraph 2, the author responds to her mother's presence by

choices.label: altering the vocabulary and syntax she had been using to express her ideas to the group
thinking about how audience determines the appropriateness of a style
reexamining the mother-daughter themes in her latest work
deciding that her mother does not need to learn academic English

content.answer: thinking about how audience determines the appropriateness of a style
